You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &ofr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ofr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D512.
  * `&ofr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D52C.
